summary: The diff updates frontend asset mapping to point the `site-logo` fallback at `/assets/generated/site-logo-fallback.dim_256x256.png`, and imports the shared constant in `Header.tsx`. However, the required static PNG file is not added in the diff summary, and there is no clear evidence (in the truncated header diff) of an `onError` image-load fallback handler.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the static fallback image at `frontend/public/assets/generated/site-logo-fallback.dim_256x256.png` and ensure it is 256Ã—256 with transparency preserved.
missing_requirements.reason: No new files were added, and the diff explicitly lists no added files; the required PNG asset is not present in the change summary.
evidence: File diff summary: Added: 0 (no new static asset)

missing_requirements.requirement: If the header logo image fails to load, the UI still falls back to `/assets/generated/site-logo-fallback.dim_256x256.png` without breaking layout.
missing_requirements.reason: `Header.tsx` is truncated and does not show any `img` `onError` (or similar) logic to swap the `src` to the fallback upon load failure; cannot confirm implementation from provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a `LOADING_LOGO_FALLBACK` constant and a `loading-logo` entry in the canonical app assets list.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for a default fallback for the site logo; it does not request adding a loading-logo fallback constant/asset mapping.
